org.eclipse.scada.da.core.server

Interface ItemChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerConnectionHandler

    public interface ItemChangeListener
    Interface for listening to data items

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dataChanged(java.lang.String itemId, Variant value, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> attributes, boolean cache)
      A change on the data item occurred.
      void subscriptionChanged(java.lang.String itemId, SubscriptionState subscriptionState)
      Indicating a change in the item subscription

    • Method Detail

      • dataChanged

        void dataChanged(java.lang.String itemId,
               Variant value,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variant> attributes,
               boolean cache)
        A change on the data item occurred.
        Parameters:
        itemId - The item id that changed
        value - The new value, or null if the value did not change
        attributes - The attributes that changed, may be null if no attribute change at all
        cache - Indicating that the change came from the cache, this means that the change was not triggered by a device and that all attribute where sent, not only the changed ones

      • subscriptionChanged

        void subscriptionChanged(java.lang.String itemId,
                       SubscriptionState subscriptionState)
        Indicating a change in the item subscription
        Parameters:
        itemId - The item ID that changed
        subscriptionState - the new subscription state
